author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a refactoring (renaming) of the AlCa Prompt producers responsible for PPS Timing Calibration.
The changes are necessary for T0 replay with PPS. The suggestions for renaming appeared in the discussion of #36273
It is following https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36698
Another PR with the refactoring of another AlCa Prompt producer will come soon.

#### PR validation:

Tested with:
```
runTheMatrix.py -l 1041 --ibeos
```
title: PPS timing calibration renaming AlCa Prompt producers
